scripts.build:cross-browser-ui:chrome: export TARGET_BROWSER=chrome UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all just-build
scripts.build:cross-browser-ui:firefox: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all just-build
scripts.build:firefox-infobar-ui: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=firefox-infobar-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all just-build
scripts.e2e-tests: concurrently --success first --kill-others 'npm-run-all -n e2e-tests:firefox-infobar-ui e2e-tests:cross-browser-ui:firefox' 'yarn serve-fixtures --port 4001' 'yarn geckodriver -vv 1> test/e2e/results/logs/geckodriver.log 2> test/e2e/results/logs/geckodriver.errors.log'
scripts.e2e-tests:cross-browser-ui:firefox: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=cross-browser-ui FIREFOX_BINARY=${FIREFOX_BINARY:-nightly} EXTENSION_ARTIFACT=./dist/production/firefox/cross-browser-ui/bergamot-browser-extension-$npm_package_version-firefox-cross-browser-ui.xpi GECKODRIVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4444; ts-mocha -p test/e2e/tsconfig.json test/e2e/tests/*.spec.ts --bail --full-trace
scripts.e2e-tests:firefox-infobar-ui: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=firefox-infobar-ui FIREFOX_BINARY=${FIREFOX_BINARY:-nightly} EXTENSION_ARTIFACT=./dist/production/firefox/firefox-infobar-ui/bergamot-browser-extension-$npm_package_version-firefox-infobar-ui.xpi GECKODRIVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4444; ts-mocha -p test/e2e/tsconfig.json test/e2e/tests/*.spec.ts --bail --full-trace
scripts.generate-wee: npm-run-all -s -n generate-wee:generateSchema:* generate-wee:verifyWeeSchema:* generate-wee:documentSchema:* generate-wee:generateStubApi:* format
scripts.get-firefox:linux: [ ! -d "./firefox-nightly-linux" ] && get-firefox --branch nightly --platform linux --extract && mv firefox firefox-nightly-linux || true
scripts.just-build: npm-run-all init-dotenv-config clean generate-manifest && webpack --mode=${NODE_ENV} && web-ext build
scripts.prebuild:cross-browser-ui:chrome: export TARGET_BROWSER=chrome UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all init-dotenv-config clean generate-manifest
scripts.prebuild:cross-browser-ui:firefox: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all init-dotenv-config clean generate-manifest
scripts.prebuild:firefox-infobar-ui: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=firefox-infobar-ui NODE_ENV=production; npm-run-all init-dotenv-config clean generate-manifest
scripts.pretest:unit:mocha: NODE_ENV=test npx webpack --entry ./test/unit/all-tests.ts --output-path test/unit/build --output-filename all-tests.js --target node
scripts.watch:cross-browser-ui:chrome: export TARGET_BROWSER=chrome UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=development REMOTE_DEV_SERVER_PORT=8182; npm-run-all just-build && concurrently 'webpack --watch' 'web-ext run -t chromium' 'remotedev --port=8182' 'yarn serve-fixtures'
scripts.watch:cross-browser-ui:firefox: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=cross-browser-ui NODE_ENV=development REMOTE_DEV_SERVER_PORT=8181; npm-run-all just-build && concurrently 'webpack --watch' 'web-ext run' 'remotedev --port=8181' 'yarn serve-fixtures'
scripts.watch:firefox-infobar-ui: export TARGET_BROWSER=firefox UI=firefox-infobar-ui NODE_ENV=development REMOTE_DEV_SERVER_PORT=8183; npm-run-all just-build && concurrently 'webpack --watch' 'web-ext run' 'remotedev --port=8183' 'yarn serve-fixtures'
